description:
We know how devastating it is when a personal injury sidetracks your life. At The Stanley Law Offices, L.L.P., our team represents people in Montrose and Northeast Pennsylvania, as well as those throughout New York, including Rochester, Syracuse, Watertown, Binghamton and Central New York. Our skilled trial attorneys take a firm stance against negligent actions, seeking to hold those parties responsible for the damages you have suffered.

During a free initial consultation, you will get a chance to speak with one of the attorneys at our law offices. We take an honest approach to your case, clearly outlining the course of action that we believe will best meet your goals. From there, you can expect to have a steadfast advocate on your side, whether that means battling in the courtroom or negotiating a settlement.

Our caseload includes incidents such as nursing home neglect, motor vehicle accidents, medical malpractice and premises liability. The Stanley Law Offices, L.L.P., team also represents employees seeking workers’ compensation benefits. We know that your case is unique, which is why you can expect one-on-one attention throughout every step of the legal process. You deserve to have your day in court, and we will work hard toward obtaining maximum compensation for your injury, lost wages and other expenses.
